name: Cheese Crisps (Microwave Method)
ingredients: 8 ounce bag shredded cheese, any flavor

instructions.en: Place a square of parchment paper on a microwaveable dinner plate
instructions.sk: Položte štvorec papiera na pečenie na tanier vhodný do mikrovlnnej rúry
instructions.ja: 電子レンジ対応の皿にパーチメント紙を四角く置く

instructions.en: Place a generous tablespoon of shredded cheese in the center of the plate
instructions.sk: Položte štedru lyžicu nastrúhaného syra do stredu taniera
instructions.ja: 皿の中央に大さじ1杯強のシュレッドチーズを置く

instructions.en: Gently spread the cheese into a circle about 3.5-4 inches in diameter, not too thick in the middle
instructions.sk: Jemne roztiahnite syr do kruhu s priemerom asi 9-10 cm, nie príliš hrubého v strede
instructions.ja: チーズを直径9〜10cmの円形に優しく広げ、中央が厚くなりすぎないようにする

instructions.en: Microwave on HIGH for 30-40 seconds or until toasty in color and crisp when tapped
instructions.sk: Mikrovlnujte na VYSOKOM výkone 30-40 sekúnd alebo kým nezhnedne a nebude chrumkavý pri poklepaní
instructions.ja: 電子レンジの強で30〜40秒、または色がこんがりして触るとパリッとするまで加熱する

instructions.en: Lift the cheese crisp off the paper with tongs and set on paper towel to cool
instructions.sk: Zdvihnite syrový crisp z papiera kliešťami a položte na papierovú utierku na vychladnutie
instructions.ja: トングを使ってチーズクリスプを紙から持ち上げ、ペーパータオルの上に置いて冷ます

instructions.en: Repeat the process with remaining cheese, reusing the same parchment paper
instructions.sk: Opakujte proces so zvyšným syrom, pričom použite rovnaký papier na pečenie
instructions.ja: 残りのチーズで同じ工程を繰り返し、同じパーチメント紙を再利用する
